00027   class session_impl: public session {
00028   public:
00029     session_impl() {
00030       ASSERT_THROW(libusb_init(&_context) == 0);
00031     }
00032     ~session_impl() {
00033       libusb_exit(_context);
00034     }
00035     virtual libusb_context* get_context() const { return _context; }
00036     virtual void set_debug(int level) { libusb_set_debug(_context, level); }
00037   private:
00038     libusb_context* _context;
00039   } ;
00040   
00041   session::sptr session::get_global_session() {
00042     static boost::weak_ptr<session> global_session;
00043     if (not global_session.expired()) return global_session.lock();
00044     const sptr new_global_session(new session_impl());
00045     global_session = new_global_session;
00046     return new_global_session;
00047   }
00048 
00049   class device_impl : public device {
00050   public:
00051     device_impl(libusb_device* dev) 
00052       : _session(session::get_global_session())
00053       , _dev(dev) {}
00054     ~device_impl() { libusb_unref_device(this->get()); }
00055 
00056     virtual libusb_device* get() const { return _dev; }   
00057   private:
00058     const session::sptr  _session;
00059     libusb_device* _dev;
00060   } ;
00061 
00062   class device_list_impl : public device_list {
00063   public:
00064     device_list_impl() {
00065       const session::sptr s(session::get_global_session());
00066       libusb_device** dev_list;
00067       const ssize_t ret(libusb_get_device_list(s->get_context(), &dev_list));
00068       if (ret < 0) 
00069         throw std::runtime_error("cannot enumerate usb devices");      
00070       for (ssize_t i(0); i<ret; ++i) 
00071         _devs.push_back(device::sptr(new device_impl(dev_list[i])));      
00072       libusb_free_device_list(dev_list, false/*dont unref*/);
00073     }
00074     virtual size_t size() const { return _devs.size(); }
00075     virtual device::sptr at(size_t i) const { return _devs.at(i); }
00076   private:
00077     std::vector<device::sptr> _devs;    
00078   } ;
00079 
00080   device_list::sptr device_list::make() {
00081     return sptr(new device_list_impl());
00082   }

00084   class device_descriptor_impl : public device_descriptor {
00085   public:
00086     device_descriptor_impl(device::sptr dev) 
00087       : _dev(dev) {
00088       ASSERT_THROW(libusb_get_device_descriptor(_dev->get(), &_desc) == 0);
00089     }
00090     virtual const libusb_device_descriptor& get() const { return _desc; }
00091     virtual std::string get_ascii_manufacturer() const {
00092       return get_ascii_descriptor(this->get().iManufacturer);
00093     }
00094     virtual std::string get_ascii_product() const {
00095       return get_ascii_descriptor(this->get().iProduct);
00096     }
00097     virtual std::string get_ascii_serial() const {
00098       return get_ascii_descriptor(this->get().iSerialNumber, true);
00099     }
00100     virtual boost::uint8_t get_num_configurations() const {
00101       return this->get().bNumConfigurations;
00102     }
00103   private:
00104     std::string get_ascii_descriptor(boost::uint8_t desc_index, bool check_nonzero=false) const  {
00105       if (check_nonzero && desc_index == 0) return "";
00106       const device_handle::sptr handle(device_handle::get_cached_handle(_dev));
00107       unsigned char buffer[512];
00108       const ssize_t ret(libusb_get_string_descriptor_ascii(handle->get(),
00109                                                            desc_index,
00110                                                            buffer,
00111                                                            sizeof(buffer)));
00112       return (ret < 0) ? "" : std::string((const char *)buffer, ret);
00113     }
00114     const device::sptr _dev;
00115     libusb_device_descriptor _desc;
00116   } ;

00119     return sptr(new device_descriptor_impl(dev));
00120   }

00122   class config_descriptor_impl : public config_descriptor {
00123   public:
00124     config_descriptor_impl(device::sptr dev, boost::uint8_t configuration)
00125       : _config(0) {
00126       ASSERT_THROW(configuration < device_descriptor::make(dev)->get_num_configurations());
00127       ASSERT_THROW(libusb_get_config_descriptor(dev->get(), configuration, &_config) == 0);
00128     }    
00129     virtual ~config_descriptor_impl() {
00130       libusb_free_config_descriptor(_config);
00131     }
00132 
00133     virtual const libusb_config_descriptor* get() const { return _config; }
00134     virtual boost::uint8_t get_num_interfaces() const { return this->get()->bNumInterfaces; }
00135     virtual boost::uint8_t get_max_power() const { return this->get()->MaxPower;  }
00136     virtual const libusb_interface& get_interface(boost::uint8_t index) const {
00137       ASSERT_THROW(index < this->get_num_interfaces());
00138       return this->get()->interface[index];
00139       ;
00140     }
00141   private:
00142     libusb_config_descriptor* _config;
00143   } ;

00146     return config_descriptor::sptr(new config_descriptor_impl(dev, configuration));

00149   class device_handle_impl : public device_handle {
00150   public:
00151     device_handle_impl(device::sptr dev)
00152       : _dev(dev) {
00153       ASSERT_THROW(libusb_open(_dev->get(), &_handle) == 0);
00154     }
00155     ~device_handle_impl() {
00156       BOOST_FOREACH(int claimed_interface, _claimed)
00157         libusb_release_interface(this->get(), claimed_interface);
00158       libusb_close(_handle);
00159     }
00160 
00161     virtual libusb_device_handle *get() const { return _handle; }
00162 
00163     virtual void detach_all_kernel_drivers() {
00164       for (int interface(0); interface < 4; ++interface)
00165         if (kernel_driver_active(interface))
00166           detach_kernel_driver(interface);
00167     }
00168     virtual bool kernel_driver_active(int interface) {
00169       int result(0);
00170       ASSERT_THROW((result=libusb_kernel_driver_active(this->get(), interface) >= 0));
00171       return result==1;
00172     }
00173     virtual void detach_kernel_driver(int interface) {
00174       ASSERT_THROW(libusb_detach_kernel_driver(this->get(), interface) == 0);
00175     }
00176     virtual void set_configuration(int configuration) {
00177       ASSERT_THROW(libusb_set_configuration(this->get(), configuration) == 0);
00178     }
00179     virtual void claim_interface(int interface) {
00180       ASSERT_THROW(libusb_claim_interface(this->get(), interface) == 0);
00181       _claimed.push_back(interface);
00182     }
00183     virtual void set_interface_alt_setting(int interface, int alternate_setting) {
00184       ASSERT_THROW(libusb_set_interface_alt_setting(this->get(), interface, alternate_setting) == 0);
00185     }
00186     virtual void clear_halt(unsigned char endpoint) {
00187       const int rc(libusb_clear_halt(this->get(), endpoint));
00188       ASSERT_THROW(rc == 0 || rc == LIBUSB_ERROR_NOT_FOUND);
00189     }
00190 
00191   private:
00192     const device::sptr _dev;
00193     libusb_device_handle* _handle;
00194     std::vector<int> _claimed;
00195   } ;
00196 
00197   device_handle::sptr device_handle::get_cached_handle(device::sptr dev) {
00198     static std::map<libusb_device*, boost::weak_ptr<device_handle> > handles;
00199     if (handles.find(dev->get()) != handles.end() and not handles[dev->get()].expired())
00200         return handles[dev->get()].lock();
00201     try {
00202         const sptr new_handle(new device_handle_impl(dev));
00203         handles[dev->get()] = new_handle;
00204         return new_handle;
00205     } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00206       LOG_ERROR("USB open failed: see the application notes for your device.");
00207       throw std::runtime_error(e.what());
00208     }
00209   }

00261 
00262 std::vector<usb_device_handle::sptr> 
00263 usb_device_handle::get_device_list(boost::uint16_t vid, boost::uint16_t pid) {
00264   std::vector<usb_device_handle::sptr> handles;
00265   const libusb::device_list::sptr dev_list(libusb::device_list::make());
00266   for (size_t i(0); i<dev_list->size(); ++i) {
00267     usb_device_handle::sptr handle(libusb::special_handle::make(dev_list->at(i)));
00268     if ((vid  == 0 || handle->get_vendor_id()  == vid) &&
00269         (pid  == 0 || handle->get_product_id() == pid))
00270       handles.push_back(handle);
00271   }    
00272   return handles;
00273 }

00275 class usb_bulk_transfer_impl : public usb_bulk_transfer {
00276 public:
00277   usb_bulk_transfer_impl(libusb::device_handle::sptr handle,
00278                          boost::uint8_t              endpoint,
00279                          boost::uint16_t             length,
00280                          usb_transfer_callback::sptr callback,
00281                          unsigned int                timeout)
00282     : _transfer(libusb_alloc_transfer(0))
00283     , _buffer(0)
00284     , _callback(callback) { 
00285     ASSERT_THROW(_transfer == 0);
00286     _buffer.resize(length);
00287     libusb_fill_bulk_transfer(_transfer,
00288                               handle->get(),
00289                               endpoint,
00290                               &_buffer.front(),
00291                               _buffer.size(),
00292                               libusb_transfer_cb_fn(&transfer_callback),
00293                               this,
00294                               timeout);
00295   }
00296 
00297   virtual ~usb_bulk_transfer_impl() {
00298     libusb_free_transfer(_transfer);
00299   }
00300   virtual boost::uint8_t endpoint() const { return _transfer->endpoint; }
00301 
00302   virtual libusb_transfer* get() { return _transfer; }
00303   virtual int submit() {
00304     return libusb_submit_transfer(_transfer);
00305   }
00306   virtual int cancel() {
00307     return libusb_cancel_transfer(_transfer);
00308   }
00309 private:
00310   static void transfer_callback(libusb_transfer* t) {
00311     usb_bulk_transfer_impl* ubti(reinterpret_cast<usb_bulk_transfer_impl*>(t->user_data));
00312     ubti->_callback->callback(t->status,
00313                               t->length,
00314                               t->actual_length,
00315                               t->buffer,
00316                               ubti);
00317   }
00318 
00319   libusb_transfer*            _transfer;
00320   std::vector<unsigned char>  _buffer;
00321   usb_transfer_callback::sptr _callback;
00322 } ;

00324 class libusb_control_impl : public usb_control {
00325 public:
00326   libusb_control_impl(libusb::device_handle::sptr handle, int configuration)
00327     : _handle(handle) {
00328     _handle->set_configuration(configuration);
00329     // _handle->detach_all_kernel_drivers();
00330     const int control_interface_number(0);
00331     _handle->claim_interface(control_interface_number);
00332     _handle->set_interface_alt_setting(control_interface_number, 0);
00333   }
00334   virtual void clear_halt(unsigned char endpoint) {
00335     _handle->clear_halt(endpoint);
00336   }
00337   virtual ssize_t submit_control(boost::uint8_t  request_type,
00338                                  boost::uint8_t  request,
00339                                  boost::uint16_t value,
00340                                  boost::uint16_t index,
00341                                  unsigned char*  buff,
00342                                  boost::uint16_t length,
00343                                  unsigned int    timeout) {
00344     return libusb_control_transfer(_handle->get(),
00345                                    request_type, request, value, index, buff, length, 
00346                                    timeout);
00347   }
00348   virtual ssize_t submit_bulk(boost::uint8_t  endpoint,
00349                               boost::uint8_t* data,
00350                               int             length,
00351                               int*            transferred,
00352                               unsigned int    timeout) {
00353     return libusb_bulk_transfer(_handle->get(),
00354                                 endpoint, data, length, transferred,
00355                                 timeout);
00356   }
00357 
00358 private:
00359   const libusb::device_handle::sptr _handle;
00360 } ;

00363 usb_control::sptr usb_control::make(usb_device_handle::sptr handle, int configuration) {
00364   return sptr(new libusb_control_impl
00365               (libusb::device_handle::get_cached_handle
00366                (boost::static_pointer_cast<libusb::special_handle>(handle)->get_device()), configuration));
00367 }
